name: iNanny
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 46.

Theme: Keep it Alive!

Apparently, there's this story in the iRobot book about a robot Nanny who, after being cast out of it's home, saved a little girl who is in danger on a factory tour.  So, like, what if that was a video game?

If you enjoy, please leave a rating -- whatever honest feedback you can give would also be appreciated.
